title: 1910s Piedmont, Recruit, Hassan, Helmar and other Cigarette Packs FS
author: canjond

posts.post_title: 1910s Piedmont, Recruit, Hassan, Helmar and other Cigarette Packs FS
posts.post_content:
I have some beautiful cigarette packs for sale.  Please do not hesitate to contact me if you would like additional scans.  All prices include shipping.

Recruit – MINT & UNOPENED circa 1915s-1920s slide and shell pack.  Same size and style as the Recruits that issued T-207s.  Factory 25 District of Va. - SOLD

Piedmont – NEAR MINT circa 1910s slide and shell, complete with the inner slide.  Same style used to issue T-206s and T-205s.  Factory 240 District of Pa - SOLD

Piedmont – MINT circa 1930s soft pack with cellophane wrapping - SOLD

Helmar – EX+ 20 count clam shell - 1910 tax stamp. Factory 7, 3rd Dist of NY - $40.00

Helmar – EX+ 10 count clam shell.  Complete 1910 tax stamp -used to issue the baseball stamps. Factory 7, 3rd Dist of NY - $40.00

Hassan – NEAR MINT with original strip on front – 1910 tax stamp with 1914 overprint.  Same style used to issue T-202s.  Factory 30, 2nd Dist of NY - $40.00

Hassan –MINT with original strip on front – 1910 tax stamp with 1911 overprint.  Used to issue T-202s.  Factory 649, 1st Dist of NY - $60.00

[URL="http://s82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/?action=view&current=cigpacks.jpg"][IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/cigpacks.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Piedmont #2 is sold.  Also updated prices on the remaining.
